# forplotR 1.0.0

## Initial Release

The first official release of the `forplotR` R package, designed to streamline access to plant specimen data from the from the [Forestplots.net standardized plot measurement protocol](https://forestplots.net/en/using-forestplots/in-the-field).

### Features

- `fp_herb_converter()`: Convert field-collected plot data into ready herbarium standard templates
- `mk_voucher_dirs()`: Create organized structured directories to archive voucher pictures based on taxonomic criteria of plot specimens. 
- `plot_html_map()`:  Generate an interactive html spatial visualisation of the plot and specimens. 
- `plot_for_balance()`: Generate a forestplot  inventory full report to helps assess the sampling management
- Supports integration with tidyverse workflows for downstream analyses.
- Test coverage >95%, continuous integration via GitHub Actions.

### Infrastructure

- MIT license.
- GitHub Actions: R-CMD-check and test coverage.
- Hosted documentation: [forplotR-website](https://dboslab.github.io/forplotR-website/)
